quote: The fundamental difference between the common man and the warrior is that the warrior sees everything as a challenge, while the common man sees everything as a blessing or curse
Be slow of tongue and quick of eye
Beware an old man in a profession where men usually die young
The fire of anger only burns the angry
Never send a sheep to kill a wolf
When I am silent, I have thunder hidden inside me
Nothing offends me! I am the captain of my owm mind
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Don't raise your voice, improve your argument.
No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem.
The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
Praising yourself is a cowardly way to speak ill of others. The reverse is true: speaking ill of others is a cowardly way of praising yourself
When the only instrument you have is a hammer, every problem that comes up you treat like a nail.
if you can practice even while distracted, you will be well trained.
If you want to swim with sharks, not blood
If you don't change who you are, you will continue to have what you always had
義 Gi - Justice, Righteousness and Honesty - There is only right and wrong. And to be fair, you need to make the right judgment about everything in your life.
勇 Yuu - Courage, heroic bravery - We must learn to live life to the fullest, intensely. Replace fear with respect and caution. Heroic courage is not blind, it is intelligent and strong.
仁 Jin - Compassion, Benevolence - Help your colleagues in every opportunity. Listen before you speak.
礼 Rei - Respect, Politeness and Courtesy - You have no reason to be cruel. There is no need to prove your strength. If it were not so, it would not be better than any animal.
诚 Makoto - Honesty, absolute sincerity - Lying is an act considered cowardly and dishonorable. When to speak, act.

名誉 Meiyo - Honor, Glory - There is only one judge of your honor, and that judge is yourself. The choices you make and how you work to get them are a reflection of who you really are. You cannot hide from yourself.
忠 Chuu - Duty and Loyalty - Be extremely loyal to those in your care. For whoever is responsible, stay faithful.
